div:
Command xtype
Name
xtype Prints the XDM type of each argument
Synopsis
xtype [ serialization options ] arg [arg ...]
Options
Supports the standard [ serialization options ]
xtype prints the XDM type of each argument using functx:sequence-type
Example:
xtype "hi" <[ 1.2 ]> there <[ 1,2,3 ]> <[ <foo/> ]> <[ document{ <bar/> } ]>
Result
xs:string xs:decimal xs:string xs:integer+ element() document-node()
Commands
CategoryCommands
